May 12, 2007 D SEWBBA (Ebbw Vale) Contest (Third Section)
SEWBBA (Ebbw Vale) Contest (Third Section) 30 Own Choice Test Piece Contest SEWBBA (Ebbw Vale) Contest ebbw-vale-contest-third-section
Ebbw Vale Leisure Centre, Ebbw Vale, Blaenau Gwent, Wales, UK Best Instrumentalist: Rhys Barrett (soprano)—Severn Tunnel Prizes - 1st £180, 2nd £120, 3rd £110. 6 bands competed
March 26, 2011, 1:11 p.m. June 30, 2020, 2:09 p.m.
1 Severn Tunnel Band Andrea Ayres
2 Cross Keys Silver Band Kerry Bowden
3 Crwbin Silver Band Ceri John
4 Ebbw Vale Band Ceri Thomas
5 Newport Borough Band A. Jones
6 Oakdale Silver Band Ron Probyn
